recipesJson.name: Rasptard
recipesJson.author: noxx1993
recipesJson.description:
This is my take on a raspberry custard.
By now if you know me i am a fool for raspberry flavours. 

I wanted to make a very nice raspberry custard i can say this is amazing after a 2 week steep! 

Enjoy

EDIT: I HAVE LOWERED THE INW - RASPBERRY FROM 4% TO 3%

reviews.text: I bet if u try. 5% inw raspberry 1% fa ras. And lower shisha vanilla to 1% it would taste exactly the same, this is wayyyyyyy over flavored. And take inw custard out, it is not needed with 8% cap VC
